commit.message:
Rollup merge of #42006 - jseyfried:fix_include_regression, r=nrc

Fix ICE on `include!(line!())` (regression)

Fixes #41776.
r? @nrc

files.patch:

+fn main() {
+    include!(line!()); //~ ERROR argument must be a string literal
+}
